Package part1.mailStorePack

Class MailStore

java.lang.Object
part1.mailStorePack.MailStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, MailStoreInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
MailStoreInMemory, MailStoreOnFile
public abstract class MailStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, MailStoreInterface
This abstract class defines the different methods of the MailStore and allows to implement different type of back-end
See Also:
